tooltip.opuscaementicium.quicklime: Quicklime is a block obtainable smelting the Dripstone Block in a furnace. It's used to craft the Mortar Bucket.
tooltip.opuscaementicium.pozzolan: Pozzolan is a powdery block that can be found near lava lakes and more. It is used to get Pozzolan Ball.
tooltip.opuscaementicium.pozzolan_ball: Pozzolan Ball is one of the ingredients required to craft the Mortar Bucket.
tooltip.opuscaementicium.mortar_bucket: Mortar Bucket is one of the ingredients required to craft the §oopus caementicium§r blocks, obtainable with Quicklime, Water Bucket and Sand (or even Red Sand, Pozzolan ball or Gravel).
